supplied: ṣu kāruṇikeṣu nirāśiṣeṣu evaṁ samyak pratyātmaṁ
evaṁvimuktaya evaṁvihāriṇo bata te buddhā bhagavaṁto
evaṁvimuktaya evaṁvihāriṇo bata te buddhā bhagavaṁto ba
Śikhī ca Viśvabhuk ca samyaksaṁbuddhau loka utpannau asminn eva
o vayaṁ cāpy etarhi Śākyamuniḥ iyam atra dharmatā tasmād idam ucyate ||
myaksaṁbuddhasya saptatiḥ Viśvabhujaḥ samyaksaṁbuddhasya ṣaṣṭiḥ Krakasundasya samyaksaṁbu
pasya samyaksaṁbuddhasya viṁśatiḥ asmākam apy etarhi varṣaśatam āyuṣpramā
jātyābhūt Śikhī samyaksaṁbuddhaḥ kṣatriyo jātyābhūd Viśvabhuk ca | Krakasundaḥ samyaksaṁbuddho brāhmaṇo jātyābhūt Kana
r bhavati iyam atra dharmatā tasmād idam ucyate ||

Vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṁbuddhasya śrāvakāṇāṁ trayo mahāsannipātā babhūvuḥ eko mahāsannipāto dvāṣaṣṭabhikṣuśatasahasrāṇi | dvitīyo mahāsannipāto bhikṣuśatasahasram tṛtīyo mahāsannipāto ’śītir bhikṣusahasrāṇi | Śikhinaḥ samyaksaṁbuddhasya śrāvakāṇāṁ trayo mahāsannipātā babhūvuḥ eko mahāsannipāto bhikṣuśatasahasram dvitīyo mahāsannipāto ’śītir bhikṣusahasrāṇi | tṛtīyo mahāsannipātaḥ saptatir bhikṣusahasrāṇi | Viśvabhujaḥ samyaksaṁbuddhasya śrāvakāṇāṁ dvau mahāsannipātau babhūvat
n nāsya tasmiṁ samaye mātā śrāntakāyā vābhūt klāntakāyā vā ya
kṣāv asthān nāsya mātā tataḥ puruṣeṣu mānasaṁ ni
o mātuḥ kukṣer niṣkrānto ’tyarthaṁ tasmiṁ samaye mahāpṛthivī
hopapannāḥ iyam atra dharmatā tasmād idam ucya
as kośogata ivāsir niṣkrānto ’mrakṣito garbhamalena ju
nto nāsya mātā niṣaṇṇā vābhūn nipannā vā sthi
a padāni prakrāntaḥ parigṛhīto na kasmiṁ
idaṇḍakaṁ ca cāmaraṁ ca dhārayanti iyam a
taḥ ayaṁ tvayā dhātri kumāraḥ kālena
khena parihartavyaḥ tam enaṁ dhātry ubhābhyāṁ pāṇibhyāṁ prati
lena kālaṁ samyak sukhena pariharati | apīdānīṁ ye
jā gṛhītvāṅke niṣādya punaḥ punaḥ prekṣate harṣaṁ ja
dya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṁ pravrajati ta
hāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ pūrvavad yāvat tathāgato bhavaty arhan samyaksaṁbuddho
aprāpto deva kumāra idaṁ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣala
gopakṣmā deva kumāra idaṁ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuru
āvad iyam atra dharmatā tasmād idam ucyate
ṣī ca dundubhisvaranirghoṣaś ca iyam atra dharmatā
kākino rahasigatasya pratisaṁlīnasyaivaṁ cetasi cetaḥparivitarka uda
jīryate ’pi mriyate ’pi cyavate ’py upapadyate ’pi atha ca punar ime satvā jarāmaraṇasyottare niḥsaraṇaṁ
asmiṁ nu sati jarāmaraṇaṁ bhavati kiṁpratyayaṁ ca punar jarāmaraṇaṁ tasya yoniśo manasikurvata evaṁ
satyāṁ jarāmaraṇaṁ bhavati jātipratyayaṁ ca punar jarāmaraṇaṁ
tasyaitad abhavat kasmiṁ nu sati jāti
dapādi | upādāne ’sati bhavo na bhavati upādānanirodhād bha
aḥ tasya yoniśo manasikurvata evaṁ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya uda
bhavat kasmiṁ nv asati tṛṣṇā na bhavati kasya nirodhāt tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ tasya
yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi | vedanāyām asatyāṁ tṛṣṇā na bhavati vedanānirodhāt tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ

tasyaitad abhavat kasmiṁ nv asati vedanā na bhavati kasya nirodhād vedanānirodhaḥ tasya yoniśo manasikurvata evaṁ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi | sparśe ’sati vedanā na bhavati sparśanirodhād vedanānirodhaḥ

tasyaitad abhavat kasmiṁ nv asati sparśo na bhavati kasya nirodhāt sparśanirodhaḥ tasya yoniśo manasikurvata evaṁ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi | ṣaḍāyatane ’sati sparśo na bhavati ṣaḍāyatananirodhāt sparśanirodhaḥ

tasyaitad abhavat kasmiṁ nv asati ṣaḍāyatanaṁ na bhavati kasya nirodhāt ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ tasya yoniśo manasikurvata evaṁ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi | nāmarūpe ’sati ṣaḍāyatanaṁ na bhavati nāmarūpanirodhāt ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ

tasyaitad abhavat kasmiṁ nv asati nāmarūpaṁ na bhavati kasya nirodhān nāmarūpanirodhaḥ tasya yoniśo manasikurvata evaṁ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi | vijñāne ’sati nāmarūpaṁ na bhavati vijñānanirodhān nāmarūpanirodhaḥ
tasyaitad abhavat kasmiṁ nv asati vijñānaṁ na bhavati kasya nirodhād vijñānanirodhaḥ tasya yoniśo manasikurvata evaṁ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi | saṁskāreṣv asatsu vijñānaṁ na bhavati saṁskārani
smiṁ nv asati saṁskārā na bha
anti kasya nirodhāt saṁskāranirodhaḥ tasya yoniśo manasikurvata evaṁ yathā
maraṇanirodhagāminīṁ pratipadam adrākṣīt evaṁ jātiṁ bha
naḥ samyaksaṁbuddhasyaitad abhavat yanv ahaṁ Khaṇḍasya ca rājakumāra
hi tvaṁ bho dāvapāla yena Khaṇḍaś ca rājaku
ś ca rājakumāras Tiṣyaś ca purohitaputras tenopajagāma upetya Khaṇḍaṁ ca rājakumāraṁ Ti
atha khalu Khaṇḍaś ca rājakumāras Tiṣyaś ca purohi
ksaṁbuddhas tenopajagmatuḥ upetya Vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṁbuddhasya pādau śirasā va
Tiṣyaṁ ca purohitaputraṁ Vipaśyī samyaksaṁbuddhas tri
āṇi Vipaśyī samyaksaṁbuddho ’nuttarāṁ samyaksaṁbodhim abhisaṁbuddho deśayati Bandhumatyāṁ rājadhānyāṁ dharmam
m atra dharmatā tasmād idam ucyate ||
tvaikānte nyaṣīdan ekāntaniṣaṇṇāny aśītir bhikṣusahasrāṇi Vipaśyī
āya lokānukampāyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām api tu
atha devatāḥ Śuddhāvāse sthitās tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya bhagavantam avocan
dvāṣaṣṭabhikṣuśatasahasrāṇi bhagavān śrāvakān udyojayet aham api
varṣāṇām atyayād Bandhumatīṁ rājadhānīm āgamiṣyanti p
ya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām api tu ṣaṇṇāṁ
varṣānāṁ ekaṁ varṣam pañcanāṁ varṣāṇām atyayād bhavadbhir Bandhumātīṁ
nirgatayor dvayor varṣayor devatā ārocayanti nirgate bhadantāś ṣaṇṇāṁ varṣānāṁ dve varṣe caturṇāṁ varṣāṇām atyayād
nirgateṣu triṣu varṣeṣu yāvan nirgateṣu ṣaṭsu varṣeṣu devatāḥ Śuddhāvāse
ni nirgatāni bhavadbhir Bandhumatīṁ rājadhānīṁ gantavyaṁ prātimokṣasūtroddeśaṁ śrotum
jagmur Bandhumatīṁ rājadhānīm iyam atra dharmatā tasmād idam ucyate ||
āṇaratīnāṁ devatānām evam abhavat Vipaśyī sam
t niṣadya Vipaśyī samyaksaṁbuddhaḥ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam ud
ya dvāṣaṣṭasya bhikṣuśatasahasrāṇāṁ purataḥ paryaṅke paryaṅkena nya
iyam atra dharmatā tasmād idam ucyate ||
rayet prasāritaṁ vā saṁmiñjayed evam evāhaṁ Jambudvīpe ’ntarhito ’bṛhe devani
r evam āhuḥ ehi bhagavaṁ svāgataṁ bhadanta kuto bhagavāṁś ciracira
ḥ vayaṁ Kāśyapasya vayaṁ bhagavataḥ śrāvakā
harṣayitvā tadrūpaṁ samādhiṁ samāpanno yathā samāhit
’tape devanikāye yāvat Sudarśane devanikāye pratyasthām pūrvavad yā
adyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṁmiñjitaṁ vā bāhuṁ prasārayet prasāritaṁ vā saṁmiñja
āyikābhir devatābhiḥ sārdhaṁ Sudṛśakāyikābhir devatābhiḥ sārdhaṁ
